macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $88K as Altcoins Lead Market-Wide Pullback
items.summary: Bitcoin slipped 1.12% below $88,000 and Ethereum dropped 1.5% near $3,000 over the past 24 hours, with altcoins like Audiera plunging over 41% and WIF hitting a weekly low after a 12% drop. The NFT sector led losses with top NFTs down more than 9% amid broad declines.

items.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Face Intensifying Bearish Momentum
items.summary: Analysts warn of prolonged bearish pressure on Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP due to structural weakness, falling RSI indicators, ETF outflows, and thin order books. The market shows uncertainty with key resistance levels unbreached and downside risks mounting.

items.title: XRP Needs Four-Digit Prices to Ease Sovereign Settlement Liquidity Stress
items.summary: Market commentator outlines a three-stage valuation for XRP, predicting sharp price increases to four-digit levels for efficient sovereign-scale settlements, driven by institutional adoption rather than speculation. Current price above $1.9 is seen as undervalued for banks' needs.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: GenEnv Co-evolution Accelerates AI Learning on Dynamic Benchmarks
items.summary: Researchers introduced GenEnv, a co-evolutionary system that boosts AI agent performance by up to 40.3% on ALFWorld tasks compared to 7B baselines, using 3.3 times less data than Gemini 2.5 Pro augmentation. It enables data-efficient scaling for LLM agents through dynamic, difficulty-calibrated curricula.

items.title: University of Illinois Showcases Over 40 AI Papers at NeurIPS 2025
items.summary: The University of Illinois highlighted extensive AI research at NeurIPS 2025 in San Diego, covering machine learning theory, computer vision, NLP, reinforcement learning, and responsible AI, with a preview event at Micro-NeurIPS.

items.title: Salesforce Backpedals on Agentic AI Hype for Agentforce
items.summary: Salesforce is shifting Agentforce from generative AI and LLMs to traditional 'if-then' automation due to reliability issues, acknowledging less trust in LLMs and increased need for human troubleshooting.

items.title: Federated AI Learning Deployed at Three US National Labs
items.summary: Three US national labs are implementing federated AI learning, as covered in recent HPC-AI news bytes alongside discussions from AI 'doomers' and high-frequency trading advancements.

items.title: AI Venture Capital Reshapes Silicon Valley in 2025
items.summary: Artificial intelligence drove major changes in venture capital, office space, hiring, and regional strategy across Silicon Valley throughout 2025.

items.title: Agentic AI Advances Finance with Proactive Investment Tools
items.summary: Boosted AI's agentic AI anticipates user needs for tailored investment recommendations, voice interactions, and democratized research, distinguishing it from generative AI.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store gives away Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night for 24 hours
items.summary: Epic Games Store's December 23 mystery free title was revealed as Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night, available to claim until Dec. 24 at 16:00 UTC; the giveaway highlights the side‑scrolling RPG's strong reviews and controller support while noting some complaints about drop rates and pacing.[1]

items.title: Black Desert deploys December 24 update with fixes, snowboard event and adjustments
items.summary: Pearl Abyss released a December 24 patch for Black Desert featuring event additions (including a Snowboard Showdown), multiple quest and UI fixes, world boss schedule adjustments, and several item/loot changes and recoveries.[2]

items.title: Dying Light series receives December updates across The Beast, Dying Light 2 and original
items.summary: Dying Light: The Beast got a fresh content update, Dying Light 2 returned with a seasonal event, and the original Dying Light launched holiday activities as part of the franchise's December update preview.[3]

items.title: Nintendo highlights party games lineup and new/updated Switch releases for the holiday season
items.summary: Nintendo's Dec. 24 post spotlights multiplayer and party games for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 — including Mario Kart World, LEGO Party, Jackbox Party Pack 11, Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds (Switch 2 edition), and Just Dance 2026 — positioning these as recommended titles for festive local and online play.[4]

items.title: DDO schedules Wednesday maintenance downtime
items.summary: Dungeons & Dragons Online (DDO) announced weekly maintenance downtime for Dec. 24: game worlds will be unavailable from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM Eastern (UTC‑5).[5]

items.title: Report: 2025 game releases dominate consumer purchases, GAMIVO research finds
items.summary: GAMIVO-backed research reported that 60% of video games bought this year were released between 2021 and 2025, with 28% of purchases for titles that premiered in 2025 and 24% for 2024 releases, indicating strong consumer demand for recent releases.[6]

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Canon Receives TSMC 2025 Excellent Performance Award for Production Support
items.summary: Canon Inc. was awarded the 2025 Excellent Performance Award by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. for outstanding production support. The recognition highlights Canon's contributions to TSMC's operations.

items.title: Tencent Uses Japanese Deal to Access Restricted Nvidia Chips
items.summary: Chinese tech giant Tencent has found a legal way through a Japanese partnership to obtain Nvidia's advanced semiconductors despite US export restrictions. This development allows Tencent to bypass bans on high-end chips.

items.title: Hyundai Motor Group Announces Key Executive Appointments in Software and IT
items.summary: Hyundai Motor Group appointed new leaders to strengthen its software and IT divisions, including President Jin as Head of ICT Division and Seokmoon Ryoo as CEO of Hyundai AutoEver. These changes support the group's shift to software-defined mobility.
